item.title: A Bottomless Battery For Your Smartphone and Tablet
item.description: Staying connected while mobile is easy with today’s technology, but our devices always seem to run out of power at the worst times. External batteries can help, but they also need recharging. The Solio Bolt offers a solution: a pocket-sized battery that charges itself using solar energy. Small-scale solar technology has been utilized for years in specialized fields, but the Solio Bolt combines efficient solar cells with a powerful lithium battery to create a device capable of fully charging a smartphone or tablet.
